testsuite.name: jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS

testcase.name: jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Exec[create /install directory] with command => "mkdir -p /install", unless => "test -d /install" and user => "root"
jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS should contain File[/install] that requires Exec[create /install directory]
jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS should contain File[/install/jdk-7u79-linux-x64.tar.gz] that requires File[/install]
jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Jdk7::Config::Javaexec[jdkexec JDK7 7u79] that requires File[/install/jdk-7u79-linux-x64.tar.gz]

jdk7::install7 CentOS with all the defaults on operatingsystem CentOS should contain Exec[set urandom jdk1.7.0_79] with command => "sed -i -e's/^securerandom.source=.*/securerandom.source=file:\\/dev\\/.\\/urandom/g' /usr/java/jdk1.7.0_79/jre/lib/security/java.security", unless => "grep '^securerandom.source=file:/dev/./urandom' /usr/java/jdk1.7.0_79/jre/lib/security/java.security" and user => "root"
